verses.text: Now when all this was \w finished|strong="H3615"\w*, all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that were \w present|strong="H4672"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w brake|strong="H7665"\w* the \w images|strong="H4676"\w* in \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w*, and cut \w down|strong="H1438"\w* the \w groves|strong="H0842"\w*, and threw \w down|strong="H5422"\w* the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* and the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* out of all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, in \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* also and \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, until they had utterly \w destroyed|strong="H3615"\w* them all. Then all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*, into their own \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*.\f + \fr 31.1 \ft present: Heb. found\f*\f + \fr 31.1 \ft images: Heb. statues\f*\f + \fr 31.1 \ft until…: Heb. until to make an end\f*

¶ And \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* the \w courses|strong="H4256"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* after their \w courses|strong="H4256"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to his \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* for burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* and for peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w*, and to give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w*, and to \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* in the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w tents|strong="H4264"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\add He appointed\add* also the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w portion|strong="H4521"\w* of his \w substance|strong="H7399"\w* for the burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, \add to wit\add*, for the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* and \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, and the burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* for the \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, and for the new \w moons|strong="H2320"\w*, and for the set \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*, as \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Moreover he \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w portion|strong="H4521"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, that they might be \w encouraged|strong="H2388"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And as soon as the \w commandment|strong="H1697"\w* came \w abroad|strong="H6555"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7235"\w* the \w firstfruits|strong="H7225"\w* of \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, and of all the \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*; and the \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* of all \add things\add* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* they in \w abundantly|strong="H7230"\w*.\f + \fr 31.5 \ft came…: Heb. brake forth\f*\f + \fr 31.5 \ft honey: or, dates\f*

And \add concerning\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, that \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, they also brought \w in|strong="H0935"\w* the \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* of \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* and \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and the \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* of holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w* which were \w consecrated|strong="H6942"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* by \w heaps|strong="H6194"\w*.\f + \fr 31.6 \ft by heaps: Heb. heaps, heaps\f*

In the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* they \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to lay the \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* of the \w heaps|strong="H6194"\w*, and \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* \add them\add* in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

And when \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w heaps|strong="H6194"\w*, they \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
Then \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* \w questioned|strong="H1875"\w* with the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* concerning the \w heaps|strong="H6194"\w*.

And \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Since \add the people\add* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, we have had \w enough|strong="H7646"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and have \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w plenty|strong="H7230"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; and that which is \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \add is\add* this great \w store|strong="H1995"\w*.

¶ Then \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* to \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and they \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \add them\add*,\f + \fr 31.11 \ft chambers: or, storehouses\f*

And brought \w in|strong="H0935"\w* the \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w* and the \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* and the \w dedicated|strong="H6944"\w* \add things\add* \w faithfully|strong="H0530"\w*: over which \w Cononiah|strong="H3562"\w* the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w* \add was\add* \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w*, and \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \add was\add* the \w next|strong="H4932"\w*.

And \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w*, and \w Azaziah|strong="H5812"\w*, and \w Nahath|strong="H5184"\w*, and \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w*, and \w Jerimoth|strong="H3406"\w*, and \w Jozabad|strong="H3107"\w*, and \w Eliel|strong="H0447"\w*, and \w Ismachiah|strong="H3253"\w*, and \w Mahath|strong="H4287"\w*, and \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, \add were\add* \w overseers|strong="H6496"\w* under the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Cononiah|strong="H3562"\w* and \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, at the \w commandment|strong="H4662"\w* of \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* the \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 31.13 \ft under…: Heb. at the hand\f*

And \w Kore|strong="H6981"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Imnah|strong="H3232"\w* the \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, the \w porter|strong="H7778"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, \add was\add* over the freewill \w offerings|strong="H5071"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w distribute|strong="H5414"\w* the \w oblations|strong="H8641"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*.

And next him \add were\add* \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w*, and \w Miniamin|strong="H4509"\w*, and \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, and \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w*, and \w Shecaniah|strong="H7935"\w*, in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, in \add their\add* set \w office|strong="H0530"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w courses|strong="H4256"\w*, as well to the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* as to the \w small|strong="H6996"\w*:\f + \fr 31.15 \ft next…: Heb. at his hand\f*\f + \fr 31.15 \ft set…: or, trust\f*

Beside their \w genealogy|strong="H3187"\w* of \w males|strong="H2145"\w*, from \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, \add even\add* unto every one that \w entereth|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, his \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \w portion|strong="H1697"\w* for their \w service|strong="H5656"\w* in their \w charges|strong="H4931"\w* according to their \w courses|strong="H4256"\w*;

Both to the \w genealogy|strong="H3187"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, in their \w charges|strong="H4931"\w* by their \w courses|strong="H4256"\w*;

And to the \w genealogy|strong="H3187"\w* of all their little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, through all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*: for in their set \w office|strong="H0530"\w* they \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* themselves in \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*:\f + \fr 31.18 \ft set…: or, trust\f*

Also of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \add which were\add* in the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* of the \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w* of their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, in every several \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that were \w expressed|strong="H5344"\w* by \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w portions|strong="H4490"\w* to all the \w males|strong="H2145"\w* among the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and to all that were reckoned by \w genealogies|strong="H3187"\w* among the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*.

¶ And thus \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w Hezekiah|strong="H3169"\w* throughout all \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* and \w right|strong="H3477"\w* and \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And in every \w work|strong="H4639"\w* that he \w began|strong="H2490"\w* in the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, and in the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, to \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add* with all his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and \w prospered|strong="H6743"\w*.
